findings.title: Unprotected approve Function
findings.description: The approve function is declared as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected Transfer Function
findings.description: The transfer function is publicly accessible and can be exploited by non-whitelisted wallets.

findings.title: transferFrom
findings.description: Unprotected transferFrom function allows unauthorized token transfers.

findings.title: Unprotected permit Function
findings.description: The permit function is marked as External and has no access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected mint Function
findings.description: The 'mint' function is marked as external and has no access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Burn Tokens
findings.description: The burnTokens function allows burning tokens without proper access control.

findings.title: Swap Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The swap function has a vulnerability.

findings.title: Skim
findings.description: Potential reentrancy vulnerability in skim function.

findings.title: Unprotected Sync Function
findings.description: The 'sync' function is not properly protected and can be accessed by anyone, potentially leading to unintended behavior or security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected Initialize Function
findings.description: The initialize function is declared as external and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unintended behavior or state changes.

findings.title: _burn
findings.description: Internal function _burn has no description provided.

findings.title: excludeFromReward
findings.description: The excludeFromReward function allows the owner to exclude a user from receiving rewards, which can lead to unfair treatment of users.

findings.title: includeInReward
findings.description: The includeInReward function has a vulnerability as it can only be called by the owner.

findings.title: excludeFromFee
findings.description: The excludeFromFee function allows owners to exclude certain addresses from fees.

findings.title: includeInFee
findings.description: The includeInFee function has a potential vulnerability as it can be called by the owner only.

findings.title: excludedFromMaxTxAmount
findings.description: The 'excludedFromMaxTxAmount' function allows the owner to exclude certain addresses from maximum transaction amount restrictions.

findings.title: Unprotected Function: includeInMaxTxAmount
findings.description: The function includeInMaxTxAmount has no access modifier and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unintended behavior.

findings.title: excludedFromExternalTokenMinAmount
findings.description: The 'excludedFromExternalTokenMinAmount' function has a vulnerability related to external token minimum amount.

findings.title: includeInExternalTokenMinAmount
findings.description: The includeInExternalTokenMinAmount function has a vulnerability.

findings.title: excludedFromAntiWhale
findings.description: The excludedFromAntiWhale function allows certain addresses to bypass anti-whale mechanisms, potentially leading to unfair advantages.

findings.title: includeInAntiWhale
findings.description: The includeInAntiWhale function has public access and can be called by anyone, potentially allowing unauthorized users to manipulate the anti-whale mechanism.
